Title: Authorizes and directs the commissioner of agriculture and markets to conduct a study on climate resilient crops and climate smart farming practices
Summary: Authorizes and directs the commissioner of agriculture and markets to conduct a study on climate resilient crops and climate smart farming practices; requires the commissioner to report to the governor and legislature within one year with recommendations for legislation and administrative programs.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize and direct the commissioner of agriculture and markets to conduct a study on climate resilient crops and climate smart farming practices
